# serval_team_users (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "serval_team_users" "example_team_users" {
  team_id = "team_id"
  user_id = "userId"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `team_id` (String) The team ID to list users for.

### Optional

- `max_items` (Number) Max items to fetch, default: 1000
- `user_id` (String) Filter by user ID. If not provided, returns all users in the team.

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) The items returned by the data source (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) A timestamp in RFC 3339 format (e.g., "2017-01-15T01:30:15.01Z").
- `role` (String) Available values: "TEAM_USER_ROLE_UNSPECIFIED", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_AGENT", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_MANAGER", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_BUILDER", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_VIEWER", "TEAM_USER_ROLE_CONTRIBUTOR".
- `team_id` (String)
- `user_id` (String)
